Our services

Strategy

Product discovery workshops, design sprints, user research, user interviews, and product planning are some techniques we use before jumping to the design itself.

Learn more

Product design

Producing, prototyping and testing sketches, high-fidelity wireframes and the final UI is a process that results in intuitive and impactful design that's easy on the eyes.

Learn more

Development

With GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT, our AI-powered engineering, combined with the right tech stack for each job, ensures we deliver robust solutions on time and within budget.

Learn more

Quality assurance

Our QA engineering team makes your product bug-free, bulletproof and performance-driven through both automation and manual testing.

Learn more

Marketing & growth

By understanding the mechanics of digital marketing, we make sure to put your product, at the right time, in front of the right people.

Learn more

Discovery
Workshops: From
Idea to Roadmap

Ever been on the edge of launching a project with a standout agency, but caught between excitement and a tight budget? We've all been there. Join us as we decode the steps from project requirements to realization. Discover the backstage magic of turning visions into reality.

Shawnna von Blixen

They brought Life and Joy to the project

The Cinnamon team exhibited amazing energy and vitality which significantly enhanced the project's overall atmosphere. Before my involvement with the company, I was told by colleagues they bring something fresh amongst mediocrity. Now, I extend my gratitude to the entire team for their dedication, effort, and especially their work for this incredible system they have inputted.

Renata Zapata

CEO, Avionica

Cinnamon is just the best agency I've ever worked with.

Everyone at the team is passionate about what they do. They are supportive, honest and direct when it matters. My responsibility was to make sure no creative soul would die in the process and it was a joy delivering this project to many people who find stellar futuristic experiences.

Abhi Riberot

UX Director & CEO, Cornell, United States

Agile team on demand

By hiring and managing talented people with skills specific to your project, we build you a team that's accomplished, agile and scalable in both directions.

Jump on board with Cinnamon and get the privilege of working on challenging projects for leading global companies. Even though there are no open vacancies at this time, reach out with an open job application and we’ll keep in the loop.
